I am **Sofia** and I am a postdoc in the [Cardiovascular Engineering Group](https://www.artorg.unibe.ch/research/cve/index_eng.html) at the ARTORG Center, University of Bern, Switzerland.

My current project is on the brain vasculature under the supervision of [Dr. Franca Schmid](https://franca-schmid.com). My current project aims to simulate blood flow in the entire mouse brain dataset, enhancing understanding of vascular function in both well-studied and understudied brain regions.
 
My prior work includes investigating neuron-glial-vascular coupling from the single-cell level to cortical dynamics using computational simulations.

My research interests lie in computational neuroscience, with a focus on neuro-glia-vascular coupling, brain metabolism, calcium signaling, and neuronal electrophysiology.
